description.en: Malaysia's Consumer Price Index (CPI) is a monthly publication which presents statistics covering 12 main groups of goods and services. This is consistent with the classification according to the United Nations "Classification of Individual Consumption According to Purpose (COICOP)".
description.bm: Indeks Harga Pengguna (IHP) Malaysia merupakan penerbitan bulanan yang memaparkan statistik meliputi 12 kumpulan utama barangan dan perkhidmatan. Ini selaras dengan klasifikasi yang berpandukan kepada United Nations "Classification of Individual Consumption According to Purpose (COICOP)".

variables.name: date
variables.desc_en: [Date] The date in YYYY-MM-DD format, with MM-DD set to -01-01
variables.desc_bm: [Tarikh] Tarikh dalam format YYYY-MM-DD, dengan MM-DD diberi nilai -01-01

variables.name: food_beverage
variables.title_bm: IHP Teras: Makanan & Minuman Bukan Alkohol

variables.name: housing_utilities
variables.title_en: Core CPI: Housing, Water, Electricity, Gas & Other Fuels
variables.title_bm: IHP Teras: Perumahan, Air, Elektrik, Gas & Bahan Api Lain

variables.name: furnishings
variables.title_en: Core CPI: Furnishings, Household Equipment & Routine Household Maintenance
variables.title_bm: IHP Teras: Hiasan, Perkakasan & Penyelenggaraan Isi Rumah

en.methodology: The index is compiled based on the average price change for Housing, Water, Electricity, Gas & Other Fuels items collected according to price collection centers in each state in Malaysia.
en.caveat: Core inflation measures changes in the prices of all goods and services, excluding volatile items of fresh food as well as administered prices of goods by the government.
en.publication: [Consumer Price Index, June 2023](https://storage.googleapis.com/dosm-public-publications/monthly_2023-06_cpi.pdf), the latest edition of the monthly consumer price statistics published by DOSM. OpenDOSM also features a [dashboard on consumer prices](https://open.dosm.gov.my/consumer-prices).

bm.methodology: Indeks ini disusun berdasarkan perubahan purata harga bagi item Perumahan, Air, Elektrik, Gas & Bahan Api Lain yang dikutip mengikut pusat pungutan harga di setiap negeri di Malaysia.
bm.caveat: Inflasi teras mengukur perubahan dalam harga barang dan perkhidmatan, tidak termasuk makanan segar yang harganya tidak menentu serta harga barangan kawalan oleh kerajaan.
bm.publication: [Indeks Harga Pengguna, Jun 2023](https://storage.googleapis.com/dosm-public-publications/monthly_2023-06_cpi.pdf), edisi terkini bagi statistik harga pengguna yang diterbitkan oleh DOSM. OpenDOSM sendiri juga memaparkan [papan pemuka khas tentang harga pengguna](https://open.dosm.gov.my/consumer-prices).
